item.title: effective-reviewable
item.description: Or, one weird trick to make Reviewable awesome The Kubernetes team is still new to Reviewable. As you discover new cool features and workflows, add them here. Once we have built up a good number of tricks we can reorganize this list. Hold off on publishing comments (using the “Publish” button) until you have completed your review. (source) When leaving comments, select a “disposition” (the button with your profile picture) to indicate whether the comment requires resolution, or is just advisory and hence requires no response.
